terms.meaning: Objects aur classes use kar ke programming paradigm.

Data organize aur store karne ka method.
Problem solve karne ke step-by-step instructions.

Complex problems ko subproblems mein divide kar ke solve karna.

terms.meaning: Same interface se different implementations use karna.
Parent class se properties aur methods inherit karna.
Data aur methods ko single unit mein bundle karna.
Complex implementation details hide kar ke simple interface provide karna.
Common programming problems ke proven solutions.
Runtime errors ko gracefully handle karna.
Program memory allocation aur deallocation control karna.
Multiple tasks simultaneously execute karna.
Multiple threads ke beech coordination maintain karna.
Source code ko machine code mein convert karna.
Code ko runtime pe execute karna without compilation.
Code mein errors find aur fix karne ka process.
Program performance improve karne ke techniques.

AI decisions ko human-understandable way mein explain karna.
Distributed machine learning without centralized data.

terms.meaning: Environment-friendly computing practices.
